faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to your questions for a transparent collaboration

item1.title: How does a Shopify store creation project work?
item1.description: The process starts with a kickoff meeting to understand your needs and goals. I then provide a detailed quote and timeline. Development is done in stages with regular validation points. Once the store is complete, I train you on its use and remain available for support.

item2.title: Do you offer support after the store launch?
item2.description: Yes, I offer guidance to help you better understand and use your store. If needed, I can assist you in learning how it works and provide the keys to manage it independently.

item3.title: Can you develop custom features?
item3.description: Absolutely. With my expertise in Shopify backend development, I can create custom features via the Shopify API, develop private apps, and implement specific automations tailored to your needs.

item4.title: What are your prices?
item4.description: Since each project is unique, pricing is tailored to your specific needs. I provide a detailed quote after our initial discussion, including development, necessary integrations, and support options.
